altTitles.ja: 砂の王冠

description.en:
Yuu Watase's Masterpiece Collection #4

- **Sand Tiara** (砂の王冠, Suna no Tiara)   
On their way to Eden, princess Tiara and her subjects are attacked, and only the princess survives. Follow her in her quest for revenge.  
  
- Hatsuki Triangle  
Hodaka Hatsuki takes on the personality and abilities of her old boyfriend everytime she touches a practice sword for the Kendo club. Kunie Kenshi is determined to make her normal once again.  
  
- 700 Nichi no Blue  
Oikawa Masumi tells about her work on a painting titled "Blue Magician" and the man who helped her.
description.it:
ITALIANO  
Suna no Tiara narra le vicende di Tiara, principessa di una piccola tribù che è in viaggio con quest’ultima e con i suoi genitori per raggiungere la favolosa e leggendaria terra di Eden, dove si racconta che tutti gli esseri viventi ne traggano vantaggi miracolosi. Durante, però, una pausa che effettuano in una oasi, dopo aver salvato una bambina in preda alle acque di un fiume, la giovane sente delle grida e quando fa per tornare indietro si vede uccidere Eda (la bimba) davanti agli occhi e i corpi inanime dei genitori e dei componenti dell’intera tribù. Come se non bastasse, l’uomo che aveva fatto tutto ciò la violenta e, fatto ciò, la lascia in balia del deserto. Quando Tiara decide di rinunciare alla sua femminilità e di rischiare la vita per vendicare i suoi, incontra Yuuza, un giovane ragazzo e sua madre, Hauna. Si fa passare per un ragazzo, col nome di Tial, e si unisce a loro per raggiungere la terra di Eden e vendicare il suo popolo.  
   
Hatsuki Triangle narra le vicende di Hodoka Hatsuki che si è appena trasferita in una nuova scuola, famosa per il suo club di kendo. Infatti nota gli allenamenti che il club sta tenendo e, facendosi prendere da un momento di panico, scappa via… A quel punto si perde e quando va a chiedere a due ragazzi, realizza che anche loro fanno parte del club. Quando questi le si avvicinano di molto però, un ragazzo le viene in soccorso realizzando la sua richiesta di allontanarli da sè… Dopo averla aiutata, il giovane la lascia e se ne va…  
   
 700 Nichi no Buruu Questa storia purtroppo non l'abbiamo trovata,nonostante il manga inglese risulti concluso… chiunque la trovi potrebbe farcela avere? grazie

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方

altTitles.es-la: Cómo mi novia y yo empezamos nuestro bonito romance.

description.en:
Yoshiko Yokozawa is an office lady who loves cute things and being cute herself. Because of this, she is often not taken seriously and she is fed up with it. On the other hand, Chiaki Kurisu, a sales representative from a trading company, always seems very serious when she visits for business. For some reason, Kurisu suddenly invites Yokozawa to dinner!? Outside of work, Kurisu-san is completely different from her usual business-like behavior, being totally open and vulnerable...!?

“This woman, is cuter than me!?”

You can’t help but fall for her. ♡ Adult girls-love ♡
description.es-la: Yoshiko Yokozawa es una recepcionista a la que le encantan las cosas lindas y su yo lindo. Debido a su comportamiento amistoso, a menudo se la ve como una mujer alegre y está harta de eso. Por otro lado, Chiaki Kurusu, un representante de ventas de una empresa comercial que acude a menudo a su oficina para reuniones de negocios, es extremadamente antipática. ¡¿Por alguna razón, Kurusu invita a Yokozawa a cenar?! ¡¿Kurusu es completamente diferente de lo habitual, mostrando su actitud natural...!? "¡¿Esta persona es más linda que yo?!" Una linda historia para chicas adultas ♡ que seguro te enamorará.

altTitles.ja: 結び屋NANAKO

description.en:
Volume 2 of the YuuTopia Collection.

1. Musubiya Nanako
Nanako has her mother's ability to see the red strings that bind to people together in love. At her parents match making shrine, Nanako is forced to bring couples together by binding their strings. But who is she to be bound to?

2. Perfect Lovers
Mitsuharu and Kana get into a car accident just after breaking up. They wake up just to find themselves in a dimension where homosexuality is normal and heterosexual relationships are illegal.

3. Memoir Girl
Katakura Hitomi does not like her new step-mother taking up all the attention of her father. In an abandoned school building, she meets a high school boy who becomes her confidant.

4. Hang In There Nakago (Part II)
Continues the tale from Mint de Kiss Me.

altTitles.ja: 放課後ファンタジー

description.en:
To pursue his dream of becoming an idol voice actor, Hoshino Hibiki tries to join his high school's manga club, which has produced a number of legendary manga artists. But when he opens a manga he finds in the club room, he suddenly finds himself… in another world!? A double life of traversing between reality and fantasy begins!

After school, we become adventurers!

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** 村岡ユウ

[Oshimi Shuuzou](https://mangadex.org/author/ac27ae52-3ed1-4784-9885-f2985b6a602f) was once his assistant.

**Additional Sites:**
- [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/yuu.muraoka.9/)

altTitles.ja: 続・思春期未満お断り

description.en: Asuka, who lived in Hokkaido with her mother, moves to Tokyo to look for her father she has never even met before. When she gets to his house, he is not there, only his children, who claim they have never met their father either. Asuka decides to stay with her "brother" and "sister" while she looks for their father. Her two "siblings" are living alone and things sorta get complicated when Asuka and her "brother" start to fall for each other…

altTitles.ja: 偏愛ハートビート

altTitles.es-la: ¡Mi novia me pone la piel de gallina!

altTitles.th: จังหวะรักพิสดาร

altTitles.ru: От моей девушки у меня мурашки по коже

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn gái khiến tôi nổi da gà

description.en: Meet Haruka Kawatsuji, a young boy who miraculously survived a fall from his apartment's balcony as a child. Unfortunately, despite his best efforts to find that same thrill in sports and horror movies, he's never quite managed to feel as alive since. However, that may all be about to change in a fateful encounter with one very eccentric girl!
description.th: สึจิ ฮารุกะ เด็กหนุ่มที่รอดชีวิตมาอย่างปากิหาริย์หลังตกจากระเบียงอพาร์ตเมนต์เมื่อตอนยังเด็ก ในเวลานั้นเขาจำ "ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงของการมีชีวิตอยู่" พร้อมกับการเต้นของหัวใจอันแรงกล้า และเริ่มมองหาสิ่งกระตุ้นการเต้นของหัวใจ เช่น การออกกำลังกายหรือความสยองต่างๆ แต่ก็ไม่มีสิ่งใดใกล้เคียงเลย ฮารุกะเป็นเช่นนั้นเรื่อยมา จนกระทั่งได้พบกับเด็กสาวคนหนึ่งที่จะเปลี่ยนโชคชะตาของตัวเองที่โรงเรียนมัธยมปลาย...!?
description.pt-br: Conheça Kawatsuji Haruka, um garoto que sobreviveu milagrosamente a uma queda da varanda de seu apartamento quando criança. Infelizmente, apesar de seus esforços para encontrar a mesma emoção nos esportes e nos filmes de terror, ele nunca conseguiu se sentir tão vivo desde então. No entanto, tudo pode estar prestes a mudar num encontro fatídico com uma garota muito excêntrica!

description.en: The legend of the killer company, Cha Si-hyuk. He decides to retire after meeting the woman he loves, but the company has no intention of letting him go easily. Eventually, everything starts to be taken away from him, and Cha Si-hyuk takes up the sword again. Revenge begins, and the war with the huge organization ‘Neville’ becomes unavoidable… What will be left at the end of the sword of revenge?

Before he became a legend, before the Tower trembled at his name—

Urek Mazino was just another Regular, climbing the Tower for a purpose greater than power: To chase after the enigmatic being, Phantaminum.

This is the untold story of Urek’s early days— his trials, battles, and relentless spirit as a chosen Regular. Witness the rise of the man who would one day shake the very foundations of the Tower itself. The legend of Urek Mazino begins here.

title.en: From a Million-View Fitness YouTuber to a Powerless Nobody in a Webtoon

altTitles.ko: 100만 운동 유튜버인 내가 이 웹툰에서는 초능력도 없는 쩌리 - 부제: 원래 그랬음

description.en: In a world overrun by monstrous threats, humanity discovers newfound strength. Amidst flashy heroes who never train, one man stands tall—Malwang, the eccentric guardian of SSAE Gym. Clad in tiger-striped gear and armed with pork trotters, he welcomes beginners with open arms and loud encouragement. Together with his quirky gym crew, Malwang fights for fitness, fun, and the future of humanity. Packed with wild action and offbeat humor, this is a story about building strong bodies—and even stronger spirits.

title.en: Eiyuu Sonogo no Second Life: Shikashi Kodomo ni Ryouri wo Furumau no wa Tanoshii Kamo na

altTitles.ja: 英雄その後のセカンドライフ しかし子供に料理を振る舞うのは楽しいかもな

description.en: Silenzio Agata, a hero of unparalleled fame known as the "Sword of Alba." His second life suddenly begins as a carefree school life?! After whimsically saving the life of a feathered fairy along the way, he ends up studying abroad at a "school for elven boys and girls" --?!
description.ja:
「アルバの宝剣」と謳われる不世出の英雄、シレンツィオ・アガタ。突如始まった第二の人生（ルビ：セカンドライフ）は、自由気ままな学園生活!?

道中で気まぐれに羽妖精の命を救い、たどり着い留学先は、なんとエルフの少年少女が通「幼年学校」で――!?

title.en: Tsuyo Sugite Yuusha Party wo Sotsugyou shita Saikyou Kenshi, Mahou Gakuen demo Aisareru

altTitles.ja: 強すぎて勇者パーティーを卒業した最強剣士、魔法学園でも愛される

description.en:
The strongest swordsman's restart fantasy!

Leon, the strongest swordsman who defeated the Demon King and saved the world, graduates from the heroic party in order to learn the magic techniques of the new age,
He decides to go to the seven magic academies in the kingdom to learn the new age of magic technology...!
description.ja: 魔王を倒し、世界を救った最強の剣士レオンは、新時代の魔法技術を学ぶため勇者パーティーを卒業し、王国に七つある魔法学園を回ることに…！

altTitles.ja: アラタカンガタリ〜革神語〜 リマスター版

description.en:
Remastered and the continuation of Arata: Kangatari as the author intended.

Note: As a result of changes imposed by the mangaka's former editor in early volumes of this series, which were at odds with her initial plans for the story, a remastered version was started and the series was paused after volume 24 in order to allow for the remastered version to catch up. However, as the story in the remastered version had diverged significantly by volume 8, in 2021 it was decided to discontinue the Shounen Sunday version and to continue the story only in the remastered version.

altTitles.th: อาราตะตำนานเทพแห่งดาบ

altTitles.ja: アラタカンガタリ～革神語～
革神语

description.en:
Every 30 years, a new princess is chosen from the Hime family to serve the Hayagami. The time has come again, but over these past years, records state not a single female has been born, save for one, the 15 year old Arata. The only problem is, Arata is actually a male! Forced to disguise himself and take the place of the princess candidate until a formal one can be found, he attends the festival only to witness the current princess, Kokuri-hime, murdered, and his own life is forfeit as well, by the hands of the princess' personal guard, the 12 Shinshou. As he runs for his life, Kannagi of the 12 convinces everyone that Arata is the one who has murdered the princess instead, and now everyone in the Imperial Court is after his head! Now, another Arata from our world has crossed over in Arata's place! How did this happen, and how will these two survive?  
  
Note: As a result of changes imposed by the mangaka's former editor in early volumes of this series, which were at odds with her initial plans for the story, a [remastered version](https://mangadex.org/title/9429f633-1005-4be9-aebf-950b96b41e4b/arata-kangatari-remastered-ban) was started and the series was paused after volume 24 in order to allow for the remastered version to catch up. However, as the story in the remastered version had diverged significantly by volume 8, in 2021 it was decided to discontinue the Shounen Sunday version and to continue the story only in the remastered version.

Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14962) (anime).
description.vi: Cứ 30 năm, một công chúa mới được chọn từ gia tộc Hime để phục vụ Hayagami. Nhưng khi đến thời điểm, không có một thiếu nữ nào trừ Arata - 15 tuổi. Nhưng hóa ra Arata là con trai, và cậu buộc phải cải trang làm con gái cho đến khi tìm được người thay thế. Khi tham dự lễ hội, cậu đã chứng kiến công chúa hiện tại, Kokuri-Hime bị sát hại bởi 1 người thân tín trong Thập nhị Shinshou. Arata bị đổ tội sát hại công chúa, và trong lúc chạy trốn cậu đã lạc vào rừng Kando bí ẩn. Bánh xe định mệnh xoay chuyển, hai Arata ở hai thế giới đổi chỗ cho nhau...
description.pt-br: Arata e Arata, um príncipe e o mendigo fantasioso. O mangá acompanha a vida de dois Aratas, um do presente e outro do passado. O primeiro vive sofrendo bullying de seus amigos e o segundo é forçado a se disfarçar de princesa até que conseguissem uma de verdade e que pudesse se tornar a Hime-ou, a governante. Um dia, porém, algo acontece e os dois trocam de lugar. As aventuras e confusões começam aí…

altTitles.ja: 二人だけのノンフィクション

altTitles.vi: Thước phim phi hư cấu của cả hai

altTitles.ja: 先輩はおとこのこ

altTitles.th: รุ่นพี่สุดสวยคนนี้เป็นผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja: ぱいのこ
先輩はおとこのこ～出会い編～

altTitles.en: Senpai is an Otokonoko: The Encounter

altTitles.zh-hk: 前輩是偽娘 邂逅篇

altTitles.zh: 前辈是男孩子 邂逅篇

altTitles.en: Senpai Is an Otokonoko: My Crossdressing Classmate

altTitles.it: Al senpai piace vestirsi da ragazza

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
Can true love really overcome any obstacles? Saki, a high school student, confesses her feelings to Makoto. Taken aback, Makoto reveals his secret, but the sudden discovery doesn’t seem to bother Saki who is already head over heels for him. After being rejected, Saki asks Ryuji, Makoto’s childhood friend, for some advice on how to win his heart. A love triangle unfolds when Ryuji realizes that he might also have some feelings for his old friend...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/senpai-is-an-otokonoko/list?title_no=5137)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 中文 (繁體)](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/bl-gl/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=3770 )
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 中文 (简体)](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/qianbeishinanhaizi/list?title_no=1935)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=3984)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8154605)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/senpai-wa-otokonoko/list?title_no=4068)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/my-crossdressing-crush/list?title_no=4235)
description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

attributes.description:
Format: A5
Imprint: Line Manga
Publisher: Ichijinsha 
Year: 2021

altTitles.ja: ありす１９th

description.en: Alice Seno seems like a normal girl in high school. She's a bit shy, she's got a crush on a boy named Kyou, and she's got an older sister who is more popular than she is… pretty normal stuff, until Alice has an encounter with a mysterious and magical rabbit girl that changes the course of her life, and Alice is introduced to the sublime power of the Lotis Words.
description.pl: Jest to historia Alicji Seno, nieśmiałej uczennicy liceum. Ala podkochuje się w Wakamiyi Kyou, chłopaku swojej siostry, Mayury. Podczas siostrzanej kłótni Ala wykrzykuje, że chciałaby, by Mayura zniknęła, a ta… faktycznie znika. Dziewczyna przeszukując miasto ratuje spod kół samochodu króliczka, Nyozekę, która mówi jej, że aby uratować siostrę Ala musi wyszkolić się na dobrego Władcę Lotisów. Czym są Lotisy? Czy Alicja wyzna miłość Kyou? I co się stało z Mayurą?

title.en: Tutorial ga Hajimaru Mae ni – Boss Chara-tachi wo Hametsu Sasenai Tame ni Ore ga Dekiru Ikutsu ka no Koto

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが始まる前に:ボスキャラたちをハメれないために俺ができるのかのこと

altTitles.en: Before the Tutorial Starts: A Few Things I Can Do to Keep the Bosses Alive

altTitles.pt-br: Antes do tutorial começar: Algumas coisas que posso fazer para manter os chefes vivos

description.en: When he wakes up, he finds himself reincarnated in the world of his favorite RPG, “Spirit Wars Dungeon Magic”. However, he is not the main character, but rather a low-quality mid-boss whose destruction is guaranteed at the beginning of the game... To save himself, who will die in the not too distant future, and his sister, who is devastated due to the illness, he begins to rebel against the scenario.
description.ja: 彼は目覚めると大好きなRPG『精霊大戦 ダンジョンマジック』の世界に転生していた。ただし、彼は主人公ではなく、ゲーム開始時に破壊が確定している低品質の中ボスです... 遠くない将来に死ぬ自分とその妹を救うために。病気で打ちのめされた彼は、そのシナリオに反抗し始める。
description.ko: 깨어났을 때 그는 자신이 가장 좋아하는 RPG "Spirit Wars Dungeon Magic"의 세계에 환생한 것을 발견합니다. 하지만 그는 주인공이 아니라 게임 초반에 파멸이 보장되는 저질의 중간보스인데... 머지않은 미래에 죽을 자신과 그의 여동생을 구하기 위해... 질병으로 인해 황폐해진 그는 시나리오에 반항하기 시작합니다.
description.pt-br: Quando ele acorda, ele se vê reencarnado no mundo de seu RPG favorito, “Spirit Wars Dungeon Magia”. No entanto, ele não é o personagem principal, mas sim um mid-boss de baixa qualidade cuja destruição é garantida no início do jogo... Para salvar a si mesmo, que morrerá em um futuro não muito distante, e à irmã, assolada pela doença, ele começa a se rebelar contra o cenário.

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=チュートリアルが始まる前に+ボスキャラ達を破滅させない為に俺ができる幾つかの事&i=digital-text&tag=kadokawacw01-22

altTitles.ja: スーパースターを唄って。

description.en:
"I jus' don't think I'm cut out for rap. There's nothin' I want ta sing about... or anythin' I want ta say."

Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding...
Just what is it that lies in his heart?

altTitles.en: The High-Handed Princess Is Not Silent

altTitles.ja: 高飛車皇女は黙ってない

description.en:
'Shut up!'

The decisive play of the villainess. Imperial Princess Claudia appears, cutting through a scene that is common these days. With her overwhelming presence, she quickly dominates the scene and imposes reality on the girl dreaming of a prince with no sense of responsibility and the duchess who has been turned into a villain! With her squire, Beryl, in tow, the Imperial Princess reaps evil after evil that creeps up on her in this painful love fantasy!

altTitles.ja: 螺鈿の楼閣

description.en: Chika, a boy who cannot reveal his hobbies and interests to others, gradually becomes attracted to his friend's older sister, Hanako.
